title: Explore meditation resources from UK Integrative Medicine & Health Services
cleaned_text: As caregivers, we need to take time away from the complex work of caregiving, even if it's just for 5 minutes. We need time to recharge and refocus. Meditation can help reduce stress and increase feelings of resilience. [UK Integrative Medicine & Health Services](https://ukhealthcare.uky.edu/integrative-medicine-health) has complimentary services for UK employees and their families. These resources have great benefits for caregivers. Reiki is a gentle energy based healing technique for stress reduction and relaxation that helps promotes healing. Now through the end of 2020, UK Integrative Medicine & Health Services will be offering 30-minute complimentary telehealth Reiki sessions along with group mediation and self-help massage for UK employees, their families and the general public. For more information or to make an appointment, please contact: General questions: [ukintegrativemedicine@uky.edu](https://ukintegrativemedicine@uky.edu) Marilyn Burke: [marilyn.burke@uky.edu](mailto:marilyn.burke@uky.edu) 859-323-4325 Here are a few short guided meditation videos from UK Integrative Medicine & Health Services
